contentTypes.infographics: 1000x1500 vertical format with clear typography, high contrast, and brand-consistent colors. Include 3-5 data points per pin.
contentTypes.productPhotography: Clean backgrounds, 1000x1500 or 1000x1000 dimensions, multiple angles, lifestyle context, and consistent lighting.
contentTypes.blogThumbnails: Vertical format with compelling headlines, brand colors, and clear value proposition. Use 2:3 aspect ratio.
contentTypes.recipePins: Step-by-step visuals, final hero shot, ingredient list overlay. 1000x1500 optimal with high food photography quality.
contentTypes.diyProjects: Before/after comparisons, step-by-step process shots, material lists. Use bright, clear imagery.

designGuidelines.textOverlays: Use 60-70 characters max, sans-serif fonts, 24pt minimum size, high contrast backgrounds
designGuidelines.colorPalette: Limit to 3-4 colors, maintain brand consistency, test contrast ratios for accessibility
designGuidelines.composition: Rule of thirds, negative space, clear focal point, avoid clutter
designGuidelines.branding: Consistent logo placement, brand colors, font hierarchy, visual style

thumbnailStrategy.faceDetection: Images with faces get 35% more engagement. Use authentic expressions, eye contact.
thumbnailStrategy.colors: Red, orange, and pink tones increase click-through by 15%. Use vibrant, saturated colors.
thumbnailStrategy.asymmetry: Slightly off-center composition performs 20% better than perfectly centered images.
thumbnailStrategy.contrast: High contrast images perform better in feeds. Test with grayscale to ensure readability.

timing.bestPostingTimes: 8-11 PM, 2-4 PM weekends. Peak engagement varies by audience timezone.
timing.seasonalContent: Plan 6-8 weeks ahead. Holiday content performs 40% better when posted early.
timing.trendingTopics: Monitor Pinterest Trends tool. Create content 1-2 weeks before trend peaks.

engagementFactors.multipleImages: Pins with 4-5 images get 2x more saves than single images.
engagementFactors.descriptiveAltText: Include 3-5 keywords naturally. Describe image content and user benefit.
engagementFactors.hashtags: Use 3-5 relevant hashtags. Mix broad (#home decor) and specific (#bohobedroomideas) terms.

ideoRequirements.subtitles: 85% of users watch without sound. Include burn-in captions.

ideaPins.storytelling: Narrative arc, clear progression, value in each slide

videoOptimization.thumbnailGeneration: Create custom thumbnails from video. Use most engaging frame.
videoOptimization.editing: Keep cuts quick, add text overlays, include brand elements.
videoOptimization.length: 15-30 seconds optimal. First 3 seconds crucial for retention.

compression.jpgSettings: 80-85% quality, progressive encoding, sRGB color space
compression.pngSettings: Lossless compression for graphics, reduce color palette where possible
compression.fileSize: Target < 1MB for pins, < 5MB for video thumbnails. Use WebP for 25% smaller files.

loadingPerformance.lazyLoad: Pinterest automatically lazy loads. Optimize for initial viewport.
loadingPerformance.preload: Critical above-fold content. Prioritize hero images.
loadingPerformance.cdn: Pinterest's CDN optimizes, but start with well-optimized files.

planningWorkflows.batchCreation: Create 30-60 pins monthly. Use templates for consistency.
planningWorkflows.contentPillars: Develop 5-7 core content themes. Maintain 80/20 value to promotion ratio.
planningWorkflows.scheduling: Use Pinterest Planner API. Space posts 2-4 hours apart.
planningWorkflows.testing: A/B test formats weekly. Document results in content calendar.

platformIntegration.crossPosting: Repurpose Instagram Reels as Pinterest Video Pins. Tailor to platform differences.
platformIntegration.websiteIntegration: Add Pin It buttons. Enable Rich Pins for automatic sync.
platformIntegration.analytics: Track Pin stats, audience insights, and conversion metrics through Pinterest Analytics.
platformIntegration.influencerCollaboration: Brand guidelines for consistent pin creation. Provide approved assets.

faq.question: What's the size for Pinterest pins in 2025?
faq.answer: Standard pins work at 1000x1500 pixels (2:3 aspect ratio) for optimal display and engagement. Square pins (1000x1000) also perform well for certAIn content types like products and infographics.

faq.question: How do I optimize Pinterest images for mobile vs desk?
faq.answer: Focus on mobile-first design with 1000x1500 vertical format. Ensure text is readable on small screens (24pt minimum), use high contrast colors, and test your pins on mobile devices before publishing.

faq.question: What file format should I use for Pinterest pins?
faq.answer: Use JPG for photographic content with 80-85% quality, PNG for graphics with text, and consider WebP for 25% smaller file sizes with comparable quality. Always keep file sizes under 32MB.

faq.question: How do I create effective Pinterest video thumbnAIls?
faq.answer: Extract the most engaging frame from your video, add compelling text overlay (under 60 characters), and ensure 1080x1920 dimensions. Include a clear call-to-action and brand elements for consistency.

faq.question: What are the latest Pinterest image trends for 2025?
faq.answer: Current trends include authentic imperfection, bold typography overlays, sustAInable/earth-tone aesthetics, and 90s nostalgia with vintage filters. Video content continues to dominate, with short-form vertical video leading engagement.

faq.question: What's the size for TikTok profile pictures in 2025?
faq.answer: TikTok profile pictures should be 200x200 pixels with high quality. Remember they display as circles, so keep important elements away from the edges and ensure your design works with circular cropping.

faq.question: How do I create effective TikTok video thumbnAIls?
faq.answer: Choose frames with emotional impact, add compelling text in the upper third, use bright colors, and include faces when possible. Optimize for 1080x1920 pixels and ensure the thumbnAIl tells a story in 3 seconds.

faq.question: What image specifications do I need for TikTok ads?
faq.answer: TikTok image ads should be 1080x1920 pixels (9:16) or 1080x1080 pixels (1:1) with file sizes under 50MB. Use JPG or PNG formats and ensure high quality for optimal .

faq.question: How do I optimize images for TikTok Stories?
faq.answer: Design for full-screen 1080x1920 pixels, leave 10% margins for UI elements, use large readable text, and include space for interactive stickers and polls.

faq.question: What are the current TikTok image trends for 2025?
faq.answer: Popular trends include Y2K revival aesthetics, cottagecore reimagined, dark academia, and cyberpunk pop. Neon color palettes are trending for entertAInment content, while minimalist earth tones work well for educational and wellness content.

faq.question: What's the size for Instagram posts in 2025?
faq.answer: Square posts at 1080x1080 pixels work for most content. PortrAIt posts at 1080x1350 pixels (4:5 ratio) perform well for vertical content, while landscape posts at 1080x566 pixels (1.91:1 ratio) work for horizontal content.

faq.question: How should I size images for Instagram Stories?
faq.answer: Instagram Stories should be 1080x1920 pixels (9:16 aspect ratio). Leave a safe zone of 1080x1420 pixels in the center to avoid important content being covered by Instagram's UI elements.

faq.question: What are Instagram Reels cover photo requirements?
faq.answer: Reels cover photos should be 1080x1920 pixels with a 9:16 aspect ratio. Use high-quality, engaging thumbnAIls that represent the video content and include branding elements.

faq.question: How do I optimize carousel posts for Instagram?
faq.answer: Use consistent dimensions (1080x1080 square recommended) for all carousel images. MAIntAIn a cohesive visual style while telling a story or showcasing different angles/products across the carousel.

faq.question: What are the current Instagram image trends for 2025?
faq.answer: Current trends include minimalist maximalism (clean composition with bold elements), authentic realism (unfiltered genuine moments), digital art fusion (photography with digital elements), and sustAInable aesthetics with earth tones and natural contexts.

faq.question: What's the size for YouTube thumbnAIls in 2025?
faq.answer: YouTube thumbnAIls should be 1280x720 pixels (16:9 aspect ratio) with a minimum of 640x360 pixels. Use high-contrast colors, large readable text (minimum 60pt), and include faces with emotions for 30-40% higher CTR.

faq.question: How do I optimize YouTube channel banners for all devices?
faq.answer: Create banners at 2560x1440 pixels with critical content in the center safe zone (1546x423 pixels). Test on mobile, desk, and TV as YouTube displays different portions on each device.

faq.question: What are YouTube Shorts thumbnAIl requirements?
faq.answer: YouTube Shorts thumbnAIls should be 1080x1920 pixels (9:16 vertical format). Create scroll-sping first frames, use full-screen impact, and optimize for mobile viewing where 70% of YouTube traffic occurs.

faq.question: How do I create effective YouTube end screens?
faq.answer: Design end screens at 1920x1080 pixels with elements in the safe zone (85% of frame with 10% margins). Maximum 4 elements, each 300x300 pixels, positioned 20-30 seconds before video end.

faq.question: What are current YouTube thumbnAIl trends for 2025?
faq.answer: Current trends include minimalist impact design (clean with bold elements), authentic connection (real, unfiltered moments), digital innovation (AR effects and futuristic elements), and nostalgic modern (retro styles with contemporary twists).

faq.question: What's the size for Facebook posts in 2025?
faq.answer: Facebook posts work at 1200x630 pixels (1.91:1 ratio) for optimal display. Square posts at 1080x1080 pixels also perform well, as do portrAIt posts at 1080x1350 pixels (4:5 ratio).

faq.question: How do I optimize Facebook cover photos for all devices?
faq.answer: Upload cover photos at 2048x1152 pixels to ensure quality across devices. Important content should be in the center safe zone (100px margins from edges) as Facebook displays different portions on desk vs mobile.

faq.question: What are Facebook Marketplace photo requirements?
faq.answer: Marketplace photos should be 1200x900 pixels (4:3 ratio) with a minimum of 800x600 pixels. Use high-quality, well-lit photos showing products clearly. Maximum 20 photos per listing with 10MB file size limit each.

faq.question: How should I size Facebook Stories for optimal engagement?
faq.answer: Facebook Stories should be 1080x1920 pixels (9:16 vertical format). Leave a 10% margin around edges for UI elements, use large readable text, and include interactive elements like polls and stickers.

faq.question: What are current Facebook image trends for 2025?
faq.answer: Current trends include authentic connection (real, unpolished moments), minimalist ism (clean design with purposeful color use), bold expression (vibrant colors and typography), and sustAInable visuals (earth tones and eco-friendly contexts).
